snippet.title: Applewood Lore Trailer + Demo Announcement
snippet.description:
This project still exists. You can play it, in fact! Try the demo: http://applewoodgame.com/download.html (Windows-only)

The full thing's a way's off, but there's this for now. Give it a shot and tell me what you think, if you want to. That'd be cool. I think it'd be cool. It'd be cool, right?

This is probably the last Applewood thing I'll post about here until I release it so yeah. The next video from me will probably be another Learn the Lore. In hopefully less than a year from now.

Is this just The Wind Waker? Yeah, probably. Whoops!

Social Media Garbo:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Crapplewood
Real Twitter: https://twitter.com/ApplewoodGame
Tumblr: applewumblr.tumblr.com
